title: UI Event Streams
description: If you're building a chat app or other interactive frontend for an AI agent, your backend will need to receive agent run input (like a chat message or complete [message history](../../message-history/)) from the frontend, and will need to stream the [agent's events](../../agents/#streaming-all-events) (like text, thinking, and tool calls) to the frontend so that the user knows what's happening in real time.
